snippet: The Jets, who kept the Wildcat offense under wraps during the exhibition season, may be ready to unleash Tim Tebow in their season opener against Buffalo on Sunday.
abstract: New York Jets, who kept the Wildcat offense under wraps during the preseason, seem ready to unleash Tim Tebow in their season opener against Buffalo Bills.
lead_paragraph: The Jets, who kept the Wildcat offense under wraps during the exhibition season, may be ready to unleash Tim Tebow in their season opener against Buffalo on Sunday.

headline.seo: Jets Seem Ready to Unveil Wildcat Against the Bills
headline.main: Jets Seem Ready to Unveil Closely Guarded Wildcat
headline.print_headline: Jets Seem Ready to Unveil Closely Guarded Wildcat
